A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A sad day for Star Wars fans. This movie was missing everything I love about Star Wars. It felt like director Dian Johnson was trying to make a marvel superhero movie. Way too much humor polishing. Also\, there were so many plot holes and undeveloped characters. Rose and Fin's subplot was completely unnecessary. Why make something fresh and new at the expense of leaving out everything that makes a Star Wars movie a Star Wars movie.
